remarks: Value of a function given by the "maps to" notation.  (This is the operation analog of ~ fvmpt2 .)  (Contributed by NM, 21-Feb-2004.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 1-Sep-2015.)
statement:
ovmpt4g.3 $e |- F = ( x e. A , y e. B |-> C ) $.
ovmpt4g $p |- ( ( x e. A /\ y e. B /\ C e. V ) -> ( x F y ) = C ) $.
$d x y $.
